text: Kyle Richard Gass (born July 14, 1960) is an American musician, singer, actor, and comedian. He is best known for being a founding member of Tenacious D, a Grammy-winning comedy band. He is also a member of Trainwreck and the Kyle Gass Band. Gass has played small roles in many of Jack Black's movies such as in Year One, Kung Fu Panda, Shallow Hal, Saving Silverman and The Cable Guy. He starred with Jack Black in the movie Tenacious D in the Pick of Destiny. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American rock singers Category:Actors from Contra Costa County, California Category:Comedians from California Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:People from Walnut Creek, California
title: Kyle Gass
